House Committee on Public Works and Transportation

official_title: A bill to provide for improved safety at railroad-highway crossings.

summary.text: Amends the Federal-Aid Highway Act of 1973 to eliminate rail-highway demonstration projects in Dolton and Blue Island, Illinois. Directs the Secretary of Transportation to implement a demonstration project to eliminate ground level railroad crossings in College Station, Texas. Repeals the proscription against additional funding eligibility for projects not under construction by September 30, 1985.

titles.title: A bill to provide for improved safety at railroad-highway crossings.
